abstract: The Association of National Advertisers is looking to set another record for attendance at its annual conference.
snippet: The Association of National Advertisers is looking to set another record for attendance at its annual conference.
lead_paragraph: The Association of National Advertisers, whose members are the chief marketers of the nation's leading companies, is looking to set another record for attendance at its annual conference.

headline.main: Full House for Annual Advertisers Conference
